page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Monday morning at half past seven my daddy comes in and wakes me up ready for school. I get my school clothes out of the wardrobe, wash and dress. After that I make my bed rush downstairs and gobble breakfast. After that I wash up then see to my ducks which means I have to change their hay, feed them and fill the pond up with water. I shout to my big sister "start getting your coat and shoes on", and off we go to school. When we arrive I play a game with my friend named Hayley. At 9 a.m. school starts. Playtime is from 10.15 to 10.30a.m. more games and fun with other friends.Science Art or Domesday work up to lunchtime. We have a cafeteria system at school, chips with everything is ace or lush(best).After school ends at 3.35 p.m. I have time to go roller booting. Homework-ugh!
